title: LUFFY IS INSANE NOW!!! LUFFY VS PACIFISTA! - One Piece Episode 521 + 522 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A combined reaction and review of Episodes 521 and 522, focusing on Luffy's demonstration of post-timeskip power.

author: Unknown Reactor
description: A reaction video to Episode 521 focusing on how the characters have changed after the two-year timeskip.

title: LUFFY SHOWS UP, STRAW HATS VS PACIFISTAS | One Piece Episode 521 AND 522 Live Reaction!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: Live reaction to Episodes 521 and 522, covering Luffy's return and the Straw Hats' battles against Pacifistas.

title: LUFFY VS SENTOMARU ROUND 2!! | One Piece Episode 521 Couples Reaction & Discussion
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A couples reaction and discussion of Episode 521, featuring Luffy's confrontation with Sentomaru.

title: One Piece | Luffy Comes Back to Sabaody | My Favorite Episode of All Time: One Piece Episode 521
author: LJLambino
description: A blog article analyzing Episode 521 as the author's all-time favorite One Piece episode, discussing character development, Luffy's Haki mastery, and the crew's growth during the timeskip. The article describes the episode as a masterpiece that encapsulates the essence of One Piece.

title: Anime Reviews: One Piece Episode 521 – The Battle Is On! Show Them What You Got From Training!
author: Burning Lizard Studios
description: An anime review of Episode 521 noting Luffy's 'I'm going to be the pirate king' moment and praising the interaction between Sanji and Zoro as some of the best and cleverest to date.

title: One Piece – Return to Saboady Arc (Episodes 517 – 522) Review

description: A comprehensive review of the Return to Sabaody Arc covering Episodes 517-522, analyzing the arc's significance in the One Piece narrative.
